verses.name: 1 Kings 12:21
verses.text: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he assembled all the house of Judah, with the tribe of Benjamin, an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against the house of Israel, to bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam the son of Solomon.

verses.name: 1 Kings 12:22
verses.text: But the word of God came unto Shemaiah the man of God, saying,

verses.name: 1 Kings 12:23
verses.text: Speak unto Rehoboam, the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and unto all the house of Judah and Benjamin, and to the remnant of the people, saying,
